column2:
"Dragorii... But I'm getting D-arker readings,
too. They seem hidden, though."

"Anyway, we'd better deal with the dragorii
to get them settled down, first."

"龍族……だけじゃないな。
ダーカーの反応……隠れている？"

"……なんにせよ、まずは龍族を
撃退して落ち着かせねばなるまい。"

"/ci5 2 Dragorii... But I'm getting D-arker readings,
too. They seem hidden, though."

"/ci5 2 龍族……だけじゃないな。

"……なんにせよ、まずは龍族を
